titles.title: Imitation Firearms Safety Act of 2017
Imitation Firearms Safety Act of 2017
A bill to improve requirements for entering into commerce of imitation firearms, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Imitation Firearms Safety Act of 2017
This bill revises requirements related to imitation firearms, including by prohibiting a person from manufacturing, selling, shipping, transporting, or receiving an imitation firearm unless its exterior is brightly colored.
